system.description:
Wards a creature against attacks from evil creatures, granting advantage on saves against their abilities and preventing possession.

Scaling: At dice count 3, extends to protect against aberrations and undead. At dice count 6, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 9, actively repels evil creatures. At dice count 12, duration extends to 1 hour. At dice count 15, creates a permanent ward until dispelled.
